challenges.title: Predict House Prices
challenges.description: Build a machine learning model to predict house prices using features like size, location, and amenities. Perfect for beginners to understand regression and feature engineering.

challenges.title: Titanic Survival Prediction
challenges.description: Analyze passenger data from the Titanic and predict survival rates. Great introduction to classification problems and exploratory data analysis.

challenges.title: Customer Segmentation
challenges.description: Use clustering algorithms to segment customers based on their purchasing behavior. Learn unsupervised learning techniques.

challenges.title: Sentiment Analysis on Reviews
challenges.description: Build a model to classify movie reviews as positive or negative. Dive into natural language processing and text preprocessing.

challenges.title: Image Classification with CNN
challenges.description: Classify images of cats and dogs using convolutional neural networks. Learn deep learning fundamentals with computer vision.

challenges.title: Time Series Forecasting
challenges.description: Predict stock prices or sales data using time series analysis. Master ARIMA, LSTM, and other forecasting techniques.

challenges.title: Recommendation System
challenges.description: Build a collaborative filtering recommendation system for movies or products. Learn about recommendation algorithms and matrix factorization.

challenges.title: Advanced NLP with Transformers
challenges.description: Fine-tune BERT or GPT models for specific NLP tasks like question answering or text generation. Explore state-of-the-art transformer architectures.

challenges.title: Computer Vision Object Detection
challenges.description: Implement YOLO or R-CNN for object detection in images. Learn about advanced computer vision techniques and model optimization.

challenges.title: Large-Scale Data Processing
challenges.description: Process and analyze massive datasets using Apache Spark and distributed computing. Learn about big data technologies and optimization.

challenges.title: A/B Testing Analysis
challenges.description: Design and analyze A/B tests for website optimization. Learn statistical significance testing and experimental design.

challenges.title: Fraud Detection System
challenges.description: Build an anomaly detection system to identify fraudulent transactions. Learn about imbalanced datasets and advanced classification techniques.
